results.name: Inverse square of permutation defined by A003188.
comment: Not the same as A100281: a(n)=A100281(n)=A099896(A099896(n)) only for n<64. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 11 2004
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (MATLAB) A = 1; for i = 1:7 B = A(end:-1:1); A = [A (B + length(A))]; end C = A(A); for i = 1:128 A(C(i)) = i - 1; end A
xref: Inverse of permutation defined by A064706. Cf. A003188.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 13 2001
